<script>
  // Set page metadata for Cusdis dynamically
  window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const cusdisThread = document.getElementById('cusdis_thread');
    if (cusdisThread) {
      cusdisThread.setAttribute('data-page-id', window.location.pathname);
      cusdisThread.setAttribute('data-page-url', window.location.href);
      cusdisThread.setAttribute('data-page-title', document.title);
    }
  });

  // Reorder Cusdis elements: comments above form
  function reorderCusdisElements() {
    const cusdisThread = document.getElementById('cusdis_thread');
    if (!cusdisThread) return;

    // Wait for Cusdis to render
    setTimeout(function() {
      const container = cusdisThread.querySelector('div') || cusdisThread;
      const form = container.querySelector('form') || 
                   container.querySelector('[class*="form"]') ||
                   container.querySelector('[id*="form"]');
      const commentsList = container.querySelector('[class*="comment"]') ||
                          container.querySelector('[class*="list"]') ||
                          container.querySelector('ul') ||
                          container.querySelector('ol');

      if (form && commentsList && form.parentNode === commentsList.parentNode) {
        // Move form after comments
        commentsList.parentNode.insertBefore(form, commentsList.nextSibling);
      }

      // Hide email and website fields
      const inputs = container.querySelectorAll('input');
      inputs.forEach(function(input) {
        const type = input.type.toLowerCase();
        const name = (input.name || '').toLowerCase();
        const placeholder = (input.placeholder || '').toLowerCase();
        
        if (type === 'email' || 
            name.includes('email') || 
            placeholder.includes('email') ||
            name.includes('website') || 
            name.includes('url') ||
            placeholder.includes('website') ||
            placeholder.includes('url')) {
          input.style.display = 'none';
          const label = input.parentNode.querySelector('label[for="' + input.id + '"]');
          if (label) label.style.display = 'none';
        }
      });
    }, 1000);
  }

  // Run after Cusdis loads
  window.addEventListener('load', reorderCusdisElements);
  
  // Also try after a delay in case Cusdis loads asynchronously
  setTimeout(reorderCusdisElements, 2000);
</script>
<script async defer src="https://cusdis.com/js/cusdis.es.js"></script>
